name: Ghost Rider
powersText: Superhuman strength, agility, stamina, reflexes, speed, endurance and durability Proficient in hand-to-hand combat skills Highly experienced motorcyclist  Invulnerability to any kind of fire Ability to project regular and ethereal flame Ability to travel between interdimensional realms and along any surface Immortality Penance Stare Resurrection Rides flaming motorcycle Wields enchanted chain Can conjure a bike using Hellfire Wields shotgun that can produce Hellfire Regeneration
